ingredients.item: 500g pack frozen essential Waitrose Butternut Squash
400ml can essential Waitrose Reduced Fat Coconut Milk
400g can essential Waitrose Chick Peas, drained
25g Waitrose Love Life Pumpkin Seeds, toasted

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6.
Place the squash on a baking tray with the chilli flakes and toss in oil. Roast for 20-25 minutes.
Meanwhile, bring the coconut milk and stock to the boil with the chick peas, add the squash, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Blend with a stick blender to smooth. Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds and serve with crusty bread.
